item.title: Trump signs order imposing tariffs on heavy trucks, buses and parts
item.description: President Trump is following through on his threat to impose a 25% tariff on medium and heavy-duty trucks made outside of the U.S.

item.title: President Donald Trump drops the F-bomb before the cameras. It wasn't the first time
item.description: President Donald Trump talks plainly, bluntly, often even coarsely. But it's rare he drops an actual F-bomb as cameras are rolling.
